external_references.description: Robert B. Fried. (n.d.). Dumpsters: Beware of Treasures. Retrieved March 5, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Not difficult if waste is placed in an unsecured or minimally secured area before collection.
objects.name: Dumpster dive
objects.description: Dumpster diving is looking through waste for information on technology, people, and/or organizational items of interest. (Citation: FriedDumpsters)
objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Strong physical security and monitoring will detect this behavior if performed on premises.
